1.content:
"ERIN!" Alex bursted into his sister's room scaring the life out of her.
"What is it?" she replied
"The babysitter...it's Amy"
"WHAT?!!!"
"And mom and dad won't be home for a week"
Erin silently cursed in her own head. She knew of Amy's antics and tickling the kids she babysits. She had no problem with tickling as long as she wasn't tickled. Her parents had always tickled her as a kid and she hated it, but once her little brother came along, she made sure he was on the other side of the feather instead of herself. She would always torture both of her siblings when they gotten on her nerves and developed a love for tickling. But as many times as her brother was tormented by their mother where she could've helped...she deep down felt bad for it, but her vow to never be tickled again stood strong, but she knew that with Amy around...it wouldn't last 5 minutes.
As her brother had a tiny fit in her room, Erin slowly began to become annoyed. She crept around her brother and shut the door, Seeing this Alex knew what was coming and began to back away giggling. Amy pounced and slid her hands up her brother's T-shirt, wiggling her fingers at his side. He immediately burst into giggles, "EHEHEHERINNN GEHEHEHET OHOHOFFFF"
Erin then went for the sweet spot, pulling off his shirt completely, she then shot her hand all the way up to his armpits causing him to fall into silent laughter. Last time she was tickled, she remembered her most ticklish spot being the same as her brother's. Their sister however, was that much ticklish everywhere and even more so on her belly.
Suddenly the door bell rang. Erin secretly hoped that their parents had forgotten something but she knew it was Amy. She went downstairs to open the door where the 18 year old stood wearing a tight pink crop top with jeans.
"You must be Erin"
"Yep that's me" she replied nervously
"You look comfortable"
Erin realized she was still in a short tank top and short shorts as her pajamas "Oh sorry, I'll go change real quick"
"No, stay how you are"
"Its fine really, I'll be back in-"
Amy grabbed her arm and gave her a menacing look "Couch. Now."
Erin quickly scurried to the couch while Amy called down her other siblings. Her brother and sister hurried down and plopped onto the couch next to her.
"Ok, here are the ground rules. No leaving without permission, no friends over without permission, no parties blah blah blah...all that stuff. But time for the fun stuff. You guys know who I am right?" they all nodded. "Great, how many of you guys like to be tickled?" Erin and Alex winced while Layla quickly shot her hand in the air. "Aww only one...That's okay, the rules for today are you can only wear what your wearing now, or less." Layla was dressed in a pajama button down with matching pants, while Alex had only his shorts on due to his sister's assault on his armpits. "I'll decide what we do today but for now your all free to go." They all went in different directions while Amy took over the couch and decided what to do.

131.content:
Alex was not used to thinking on the fly - or on the run - but right now he didn't have a choice. Then again, anyone in his position (being chased by a tickle-obsessed babysitter) would not have many options either. Nor was he used to thinking while panicking about the almost certain outcome of this chase. All of his smartest decisions, ideally, were made when everything was quiet or he was eating animal crackers or both. So it came as no surprise that the only idea that popped into his head was to escape through the living room window and run like hell. Not the smartest strategy, especially if it would make Amy angrier (and make her call his parents), but he really didn't feel like dealing with her antics.

"Get back here, Alex!" called Amy behind him. "You're just making this worse for yourself, you know!"

Of course, Alex did not stop but made a mad dash for the wide window in the living room, breaking the vicious cyclical chase around the ground floor. He stopped just shy of smacking his head against the glass. As he scrambled up the windowsill to hide under the heavy curtains, he made a quick glance backwards to see if Amy was close behind. Relieved that she had not yet caught up with him, Alex pulled the curtains back quickly yet carefully, trying his hardest not to make any noises. Against his better judgment, he chose to face the window instead of the curtains out of fear Amy would see him moving. He had even held his breath for good measure. All he had to do was wait until Amy to give up the chase and start looking upstairs and he would sneak out the window.

No sooner did Alex close the curtains behind him did Amy return to the living room, but upon revisiting the place her preteen charge was nowhere to be seen. She did not see him bolt out the door or hear him go upstairs, so he had to still be on the same level somewhere.

"Where the hell is he?" Amy asked herself, looking around the room impatiently. "Why couldn't he have just listened to me in the first place like a good boy and let me tickle him?"

Alex kept his lip tight. He was not sure how long he could stay still, but at least he was hidden. All he had to do was wait and keep quiet until Amy lost interest and checked upstairs.

Amy decided to go for the sweeter approach. "Oh, Alex~" she said in a singsong voice. "You can come out now. I promise I'm not angry with you. Just show yourself and I'll let you off easy. In fact, I'll even let you stay up late. What do you say to that?"

But Alex knew better. As tempting as the offer to stay up sounded, he knew - at the age of eleven - that if something sounded too good to be true, then it probably was. So he kept still and his mouth shut, and he even smiled in satisfaction that his babysitter underestimated his intelligence.

'Sorry Amy', he thought, 'but you'll have to do better than that'.

Amy was met only with silence and the sound of her dry lips smacking, the latter everyone who knew her identified as a sign of annoyance. With her patience wearing thin, she continued scanning the room for any signs of her charge but to no avail. Perhaps he managed to give her slip after all, but nobody could hide from her forever.

After grumbling something under her breath, Amy began to walk away slowly. "I guess he really isn't... here."

Alex gave a gentle sigh of relief upon hearing those words. He could not believe he had given Amy the slip. All he had to do was wait until she went upstairs before opening the window. What he heard from behind the curtain, however, put paid to those thoughts.

"What could be behind Curtain #1?" asked a familiar voice, just as its owner seized Alex's right ankle in a firm grip.

Alex froze. He could not believe Amy had found him, but how? That curtain was thick enough to conceal a person's shape if they remained still, and he was certain she did not see him hide. And she did not even pull the curtain back when he was discovered. All she did was grab onto his ankle as it was poking out the ho-

Suddenly, it all made sense. In his attempts to hide himself, Alex had overlooked one crucial detail: the hole in the curtain. It was not a great big hole - roughly the size of a honeydew melon - but it was still a noticeable one. In Alex's case, from where he was sitting, his slightly outstretched right foot could easily be seen from the outside, including a certain babysitter. The red-black sneaker and dark blue jean cuff sticking out of a hole in a beige curtain made it all the more conspicuous. There was little doubt in Alex's mind that Amy had caught a glimpse of his shoe as she was walking away and, facing away from the curtain, he could not see her silhouette when she sneaked up on his hiding space.

In his efforts to change his fate of being tickled senselessly by Amy, even if it was for a little while, his actions had only sealed it.

"So many kids I've babysat tried to hide from me and a few of them have tried to give me the slip, but none of them succeed," said Amy with a smug grin on her face. Alex struggled to pull his foot out of her grip, but she only tightened her grip further. Her toned arms may be one of the reasons she had earned so many admirers from boys and girls alike, but they clearly weren't for show. Once a kid was trapped in those arms or even a hand, it was almost impossible to break her strong grip. Alex was quickly learning that now, and soon Layla and even Erin will discover those rumours about her unbreakable grip were based on experience.

But Alex knew what would follow if Amy wouldn't release his ankle. "Yep, that's me alright. One more win in the book of Amy the Awesome," he said in an obvious attempt to mitigate his impending doom. "Now could you please let me go? I'll do whatever you want, just don't tickle me. Please?"

Amy was no bimbo; she immediately saw through his sweet-talk. "Sorry Alex, but flattery won't get you out of here. Not only did you break two of the very clear rules I set for you and your sisters, but you made me chase all over the place while evading your punishment. I'm afraid I can't let that slide, especially after you made my poor tootsies ache." Amy illustrated her point by slipping her right foot partially out of its braided leather sandal, wiggling her toes to gain some relief. The babysitter's feet were not used to a lot of running; their soft and plush texture were a clear indication of that fact.

"W-Well..." began Alex nervously, "if you let me go, then I guess I could rub them for you. It's the least I could do to help... Just as long as you don't tickle the snot out of me." It was another attempt on his part to mitigate his punishment, but a small part of him did want to lessen his sitter's discomfort. Despite her obvious shortcomings, he knew Amy was not a bad person. At least that was what he thought.

Amy scoffed. He was obviously trying to sweet-talk her again, but she couldn't help but ponder what her charge had said. It had been a long time since she had received a good foot massage and she could always force Alex to give her one. She could always tickle him later, of course. On the other hand, she needed to set an example. As she pointed out, Alex had broken not one but two of her rules and she felt it was her duty to enforce them. Perhaps she could tie him up and tickle him on that kitchen bar as she had initially planned. Or she could just tickle the captive foot in her hand until its owner was too tired to put up any form of resistance. Decisions, decisions.

Ultimately, Amy the 'Awesome' decided to...


retreat to his bedroom, where he always felt safe. Not the smartest strategy, but for him it would have to do. But first he had to lose the girl on his tail.

It’s so hard not to keep on making you laugh like this!” Amy thought out loud as she giggled along. Poor Alex only shook his head, not even knowing what he was trying to communicate. Did he want the babysitter to stop tickling his armpits? Did that mean that he preferred to have his feet tickled instead? Did he want the tickling to go on? Did he want the tickling to stop? Even he wasn’t able to tell, not at least while Amy’s fingers kept on driving him crazy with silly laughter!
“Oh, what the hell. Just a little bit.” In the blink of an eye, Amy switched positions, and trapped both of Alex’s bare feet in a secure arm lock. Using her other free hand, she scrabbled her fingernails all over the boy’s sensitive and ticklish soles, keeping his raucous laughter at the same level.
“Ticka ticka ticka, baby boy!”
With his arms free but with his feet being subjected to such sneaky tickles, Alex could only flail around and hug his own sides as he laughed himself silly.
The tickling of his feet lasted for only a bit less than a minute, but it was more than enough to make the boy tap out on the floor as a sign of surrendering.

“Ahh… you submit, I see.” Amy said, as she stopped tickling him. She turned around to make eye contact with him. With a bit of difficulty, and with a huge nervous grin on his face, the boy looked at her and nodded.
“Very well, then… let’s keep on playing, shall we?” Amy said with an upbeat tone as she clapped her hands. With a final flick of her fingernails, she drew out one final giggle out of Alex.

“Here you go, sport.” She said, lending a hand to the boy and helping him to get up and back on his feet. “You might better want to wear a shirt the next time… or perhaps you won’t.” She said as she winked at him. While still getting his breath back, Alex blushed and giggled like crazy at the girl’s remark.

“Alrighty, then! That was only the first round! Let’s play some more! Start cleaning the room, my lovelies.” Amy said, as the children followed suit.
Erin looked at her side, seeing her brother moving slightly slower than the rest and still getting his breath back. Even so, he seemed to wear a noticeable playful smile on his face. Did he enjoy that intense bit of tickling? Erin doubted… “he couldn’t have, did he? But his face says otherwise…”
She looked to her other side, and saw Layla making slightly exaggerated movements, that surely had the intention of making her freeze in a position that would leave convenient areas of her body exposed so they could be an appealing tickle target for Amy.
“They seem to be enjoying this. So perhaps… I could try to loosen up a bit and enjoy it as well? But Amy’s skills… they are a bit intimidating.” The oldest sister thought to herself.

Not long after her first orden, the children once again heard their babysitter say out loud: “Mannequin!”
… and at once, all three of them stood in place, frozen in the position they were.
And once again, the kids could listen to Amy’s deliberately slow pace as she walked among them, not seeing her, not knowing who would feel her feather next.

“Hmmmmm… decisions, decisions…” Her melodious voice traveled through the room, teasing the kids ears and their minds with the possibilities. Even Alex didn’t feel completely safe, knowing that there was a fair chance that he could get it again.

Amy then chose...
14211.title: First shot - Option 1

142112.content:
“Let’s give the boy a rest for a moment. I feel like listening to a girl’s laugh now.” Amy said.
Erin gulped. Layla had to bite her lower lip so her huge smile wouldn’t be as noticeable. Both of them felt like a rush of tingles and shivers washing over their skin.

Amy’s next ticklee was…
142112.title: One of the girls.

choices: Due to manners of space, Layla's tickling continues here!
... or perhaps you'd like to take this part of the story in another direction?
1421122.content:
“Oh, would you look at that.” The babysitter said. “The bare sole of a foot, all exposed and with no one to help it! It is a rare sight when you play a game of Mannequin, you know…”

Layla almost gasped when she heard that. It was her! She was the one exposing the sole of her foot, and now, that would become the target for that slender and elegant white feather she was admiring earlier.
The girl was getting off some dust off the higher shelves, inadvertently getting herself in a position similar to that of her brother in the previous turn. Layla had absolutely the intention of ending up frozen in a position that would make her an appealing and easily accessible target for Amy’s tickles. She knew that pretty much all of her spots on her upperbody were exposed… but she didn’t consider her own feet!
Amy’s words directed her attention right to that spot, making Layla notice the fact that, while one of her feet was simply flat on the floor, the other one was resting on the tip of the big toe, leaving all the rest of the sole exposed.

“Hiiiiiiii Laylaaaaaaaa…” Amy appeared in the girl’s visual field. The girl turned her eyes, the only part she could move without losing the game in an instant (and therefore missing the tickling), only to see Amy sporting a big teasy smirk while she waved her white feather for her to see. Layla fought incredibly hard no to flash a big playful smile, only with partial results. Her changing facial expressions amused her babysitter to no end, though.
“I seem to recall that you really liked my feather just a few moments ago… I’d like to see if you’ll like it a bit more now, after you and her get to know each other a bit more” Amy looked down and saw an area of Layla’s sides that, thanks to the girl’s current frozen position, the pajamas weren’t covering. She took the chance to give the girl’s exposed waist a short and gentle stroke. Layla gasped and clamped her mouth shut.
“Oh, do we have a fighter here? Someone who will fight back the giggles? I really hope we do… those ones are the most fun to tickle!” The babysitter said in a voice that was dripping with teasiness at each word.

Since Layla’s clothing was providing protection for almost all of her body, at least from the feather, Amy very calmly sat on the floor next to the girl’s exposed bare feet.
“Hmmmmm… those PJs look real comfy. Kind of baggy. They seem to cover most of your body.” Amy placed the tip of the feather on the girls toes. “It really makes your feet stand out a bit more, don’t you think?”
The feather began to travel from the girl’s toes up to her heel, kissing the skin of the smooth and sensitive sole along the way.
With each movement of the feather, Layla couldn’t help but to have her tiny foot reacting out of reflex. Her toes began to curl, her sole began to crunch slightly, filling her skin with adorably tiny wrinkles, her ankle began to wiggle trying to avoid the touch of the feather and at the same time remaining in place.
“Uh-oh, is someone trying to move? Mannequins don’t move, at least that I know of… “ Amy’s words were having a peculiar effect on Layla. She didn’t know why, but they simply made her want to laugh even more. She even felt the need to giggle when she heard the babysitter tease Alex verbally before. It was almost like a spell.
“Hmmmm… I could swear these toes are indeed moving… but that can’t be… because you’re a mannequin right now, aren’t you, Layla? And mannequins aren’t ticklish… they don’t laugh…” The babysitter’s words felt on the girl’s ears like the feather felt on the sole of her foot: soft, gentle, almost loving, definitely playful, and absolutely provocative, filling her with the need to laugh more and more.
Oh, the laughter, Layla thought. What started like a small bubbling sensation when the feather first touched her, was now growing at a steady pace into a volcano of clumsy raucous cackles, ready to burst out. Each touch of the feather was making the task of keeping those laughs inside of her harder and harder. Both the girl and her babysitter could notice how with each stroke the smile on Layla’s face grew bigger and sillier, and her tiny foot wiggled more and more.
Until the feather touched just the right spot on the girl’s arch.
“HHMMPFFF!” A loud sound came from her mouth. Similar to her brother before, she tried her best to suppress an explosion of giggles, with not quite stellar results.
“Ooooooooohhh… what was that sound? Did my cute little mannequin just tried to laugh? That can’t be… because that would mean that this little mannequin… is veeeeeeeery very ticklish… right… about… here!” The babysitter waved her teasing words like an expert, making the girl shake with anticipation through each one of them, until finally, the feather kissed the skin of her exposed bare arch.
“Aaaah…!” Layla gasped almost silently. A gentle stroke went up her arch. Her whole body shook. A second stroke caressed from the heel to the ball of the foot, travelling over her arch once more. She tried with all of her might, but she knew she was beaten and that the only possible outcome of this was only one thing: laughter!
“Coochie coochie coo…” Amy almost whispered in a loving tone, that was audible to Layla even with Amy sitting on the floor next to her foot. While doing so, she began to stroke the arch of the girl at a steady pace, up and down the feather went.
Just like brother before, after listening to those words, Layla cracked.
“HPPPFFHFHFHF!” She began to sputter muffled giggles that were one second away to become full blown laughter, but didn’t realize one important detail.
The girl took her hand to her mouth.
“Oh, what’s that? I think that you just moved… so you lose!” Amy said. As she pointed that fact out, Layla realized that out of reflex, that was exactly what she was doing.
“Oh baby girl, I’m so sorry to tell you that I think you’ve lost this round! But don’t worry, you can finally let all of those giggles out! Coochie coochie coo!”
“Ah! PffffffffwAhHAAHahaHAhahahahahahaha!” Layla finally exploded into a cloud of girlish joyful hilarity.
“There you go! Let all of those giggles out, cutie pie! It’ll feel so good! Tickle tickle tickle!” Amy smiled to herself while she teased and tickled the girl. Layla was delighted to be engaged in her favorite game, but didn’t realize that she didn’t need to remain in her previous position anymore since she had lost. And in doing so, trying to balance her wiggling body on one leg, while still leaving one foot exposed for her babysitter to tickle, only could result in the girl losing her balance.
“Whoops! Don’t worry, I got you!” Amy said, and quick as a lightning, she got up and catched the girl before she would fall.
But she didn’t do only that: she took advantage of the situation to ease the girl onto the floor, and ravage her with tickles from head to toe.
1421122.title: Layla

choices: A second round for one of the kids!
14211221.content:
“You are a veeeeeeery ticklish mannequin, aren’t you?” With one hand, Amy quickly pinned Layla’s wrists on the floor, leaving her armpits exposed. “We’ll have to explore that, won’t we? Is this cute little mannequin ticklish up here? Hmm?”
Using only one of her hands, she began to tickle the girl’s underarms. Fingers making spidering motions, nails raking gently over the skin protected by her clothes, and thumbs making deep massaging motions. Amy applied an assortment of techniques to tickle Layla, not only to make the girl laugh like if there was no tomorrow, but also for future references.
“WAHAHAHahahahahahahahahahahaha!” Layla erupted into loud and clumsy girly cackles, before her laughter remained at a steady volume and flow.
“Or perhaps the mannequin is ticklish down here?” Amy’s hands switched to Layla’s ribs and sides, covering everything from her upper ribs to her hips, using her well known and devastatingly effective lobster-claw technique.
“OHOHOHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!” Layla’s laughter went up a notch and took a bit of a more hysterical tone to it. The girl began to shake her head and to flail around playfully, trying uselessly to kick her legs.
After a few seconds of upperbody tickling assault, that also included a few random and unexpected thighs and belly button tickles here and there, Amy used her bigger size as an advantage and flipped Layla over, trapping the girl’s body with her legs, using her own upperbody and her arms to trap the girl’s legs, all while leaving the pair of tiny bare feet facing the ceiling and at her mercy.
“But this is what made me the most curious: a mannequin with ticklish FEET!” Accentuating that last word, Amy unleashed her fingernails, her most effective tickling weapons, to skitter and spider all over Layla’s bare soles.
“AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! NAHAHAHAT THEHEHEHEHERE AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!” The girl exploded into mirthful cackles and guffaws. There was no inch of her bare feet that didn’t feel insanely ticklish under the playful and tender ministrations of her babysitter’s expert fingers. Layla simply threw her head back as she laughed as much as the tickles on her feet commanded her, and let herself be carried away by the laughter like a castaway being drifted away by the currents.
“Not there? That’s odd, I thought that you liked getting tickled. Don’t you like it, Layla? Tell me that you like it.” Amy teased the girl, her fingers never stopping.
“HAHAHAHAHA I LIKE HEEHEEHEHEET AHAHAHAHAHAHA!” The girl said out loud.
“Hmmmm, you just like it? Don’t you loooooove it? Don’t you looooooove getting tickled, baby girl?”
“HAHAHAHAHAHA YES AHAHAHAHAHAHAHA I LAHAHAHAVE IT AHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!” Layla was besides herself with tickles, but the teasing was maddening! She always loved any kind of tickling games, but Amy’s skills were on another level. She never had so much fun before, with her desperation, mirth, excitement, and laughter all clashing at once inside of her.
“There we go. If you love it, then you shall have it, baby girl. Coochie coochie coo, cutie pie. Laugh for me.” Amy said with a teasy smirk on her face.
And Layla was delighted to comply. Being as ticklish as she was, she didn’t have much of a choice, but being a long-time tickle enthusiast, she was having the time of her life laughing at the top of her lungs while Amy was giving her just a taste of her tickling skills.

After a few completely blissful minutes of foot tickles, Amy finally stopped and released Layla. Getting up to her feet, she lended a hand to the girl and helped her get up.
“Sorry cutie pie, but you lost this round. You’re one step closer to getting a punishment later.” Amy said as she winked at the girl. Layla looked back at Amy with a smile of amusement on her face.

“Well! The first round of the game is almost done then! Now, chop-chop kids, unfreeze and start to tidy up the room again.” Amy said in an upbeat but commanding tone as she clapped her hands twice.
The kids followed suit, resuming their activities, with a nervous tingle on their spines knowing that they would unavoidably be subject to Amy’s expert tickles, but unable to know when would that happen.

“And… mannequin!” Amy shouted again.
Just like before, the three siblings froze in the exact positions they were holding when they heard the key word.

“Very well, let’s see then… who to… play with?” Amy mused out loud while she began to walk around the room to choose the next “mannequin” she would be putting to the test.

She finally chose…
14211221.title: Layla's tickling continues

142112211.content:
Both of her younger siblings seemed to enjoy the game, Layla flat out admitted it, but even Alex seemed to enjoy it too… Why was she having such a hard time letting go and enjoying the fun? Erin couldn’t help but wonder to herself.
Erin was breathing a bit harder than her siblings. She felt that familiar sensation of anxious tingling growing in the pit of her stomach, knowing the chances were stacked up against her. Sure, Amy could choose one of them for a second turn and spare her… but still, the tickles were inevitable with Amy around. “And it will be like that all week with her in the house…” Erin thought. “I better find a way to get along with this kind of games.”

Her train of thought was suddenly interrupted by the sight of Amy, looking right at her eyes, from a distance that Erin found shorter than preferable.
“Hey, baby girl.” Amy said in a teasy voice. Erin had the bad fortune of having to remain in place just when she was turning to her right. If she hadn’t been in that position, at least she’d had the library stopping Amy from standing right in front of her, but alas, that wasn’t the case.
Erin gulped. Due to the rules of the game, she couldn’t break eye contact with the babysitter. She knew that if she did, that’d be only used against her when the time of deciding the “punishment” would arrive. She did her best to remain in place, frozen as an actual mannequin, although she couldn’t control her almost audible breathing, and Amy noticed it.
“Oh, cutie pie, you seem anxious. Am I getting you nervous?” The babysitter said with a sweet and kind voice that both she and the teen girl knew that had quite patronizing intentions.
“Relax, silly. You don’t have anything to be nervous about.” Amy warmly put a hand on Erin’s shoulder, while she smiled at her.
Then she took out her white feather and showed it to the girl.
“It’s just a little game.” She winked at Erin. “Although, if there’s any reason that the idea of being tickled makes you nervous, I think you should tell me. All I want is for you to have some fun.” The smirk Amy flashed at Erin made her skin feel washed over by the warm wave of… embarrassment? awkwardness? curiosity? excitement? Even herself had a hard time determining what she was feeling at that moment.
What Erin did know is that her skin now felt at least 10 times more ticklish than just a few minutes ago thanks to all of that.
“Why does she have to be such a tease…” The girl thought, not realizing she was now blushing.
“You’re just too cute, did you know that?” Amy said with a giggle, noticing the pinkish shade on Erin’s cheeks. “You’re just making it harder for me not to want to tickle you…”

The babysitter brought her feather close to the teen girl’s face, until it landed gracefully and gently on its side, close to the ear.
“You’re a really pretty girl, Erin. Did you know that?” The feather began to slide down onto the neck of the girl. “I’d say waaaaaay too pretty not to be smiling…”
Erin’s breath was getting heavier while the feather continued to travel down. Her clothes protected her from its touch as it glided over her neck, her collarbone, her shoulder, and her sides. Thanks to her shirt, while she felt where the feather was, its touch didn’t tickle. Erin wondered what Amy's goal was by doing this, until the realization hitted her almost a bit too late.
“Cute tummy, too.” The babysitter said, right at the moment her feather landed on the teen girl’s side, just below her ribs, and next to her stomach.
“Look out, baby girl… if you move or you laugh now, you’ll lose this round…” Amy looked her right in the eye and bit her lower lip.
The feather began to slide closer and closer to Erin’s belly button. The girl couldn’t stop the twitches and the trembles as it did, they were pure reflex. Just like her two siblings before, she could feel how a growing pressure had appeared inside her chest: a continuously growing need to laugh! What to do? She couldn’t think of any way out of such predicament, except for letting that pressure build up inside of her, until it made her erupt into uncontrollable laughter. Submitting to the tickles, laughing, losing, and therefore get tickled again later as a punishment, seemed to be a certainty in her future at this point.
Not to mention, the hardship of having to withstand eye contact with her tickler. Erin tried her best to remain frozen as a statue, but seeing Amy’s smile of enjoyment only served to make her resistance crumble faster.
The tip of the feather danced and danced slowly and calmly inside the girl’s belly button, filling her mind with nothing but those maddening tickles taking over her. Erin could feel her own facial expression changing to one of forced mirth, as she found herself smiling against her will. All she could do was to try as hard as she could not to let that smile win, shutting down her eyes and her mouth as hard as possible, making a face that Amy found absolutely adorable. It felt like a lost battle for her… until she opened against her eyes.
Then she found Amy even closer to her, so much so that the babysitter took the liberty of moving slightly to the side and whispering to her ear...
“... gotcha, baby girl.”
Those words worked like a magic charm, making Erin break down and collapse into unrestrained youthful laughter.
142112211.title: Erin.

choices: Started the next round of the game.
1421122111.content:
“Pfffffffohohohahahahahahahahahahahahahaha!” Erin finally let out all of that pent up laughter inside of her.
“Aaaaah, there we go, you have such a cute laugh! Let’s hear more of it!” Amy said with absolute glee.
“Ahahahaha nohohoho pleeheeheeheease ahahahahahaha!” Erin begged while she was still holding her position. She realized letting all of her laughter out felt embarrassing, making her feel again as if she was a little girl… in front of someone who was barely 2 years older than her!
But also… it felt so good! Not only because of the fact that she thought she’d burst like a balloon if she didn’t let that laughter out, but also it felt… fun? Exciting? It was a strange sort of thrilling sensation that came along with those tickles, and Erin deep down suspected that it might have to do something with the fact that Amy’s way of administering them was quite peculiar.
“You know what the best part is? Since you cracked up, you already lost, but still you try to keep in position! That’s so adorable!” Amy said as she giggled.
“She’s right!” Erin thought to herself. “I can finally move!”. But at the very moment she tried to escape, Amy’s insane reflexes prevented her from doing so.
“Oh no, you won’t.” The babysitter said with an almost calm tone. As she did so, she grabbed Erin by her waist, and used her own legs to make the girl trip and lose her balance.
Before she could realize, she was flat on her back on the floor, with her wrists trapped by Amy above her head, while she was straddling her.
“Come on, baby girl. Even your siblings stood a bit more than that And if you ask me, I think they enjoyed it!”
Never releasing the feather, Amy used to keep providing Erin’s young tummy a steady dose of gentle tickles. For the girl, it was more than enough to make her laughing wantonly, whether she wanted it or not.
“AHahahahahahahahahaha teeheeheeheeckles so muhuhuhuhuch ahahahahahahahahahaha!” Erin said as she wiggled and squirmed in Amy’s grip. The older girl looked down at the adorable spectacle beneath her, delighter in making her prey laugh and laugh.
“Erin, you’re just so cute! I can’t understand how everybody around you doesn’t want to tickle you aaaaaaall the time!” Amy said in a voice that was both patronizing and affectionate at the same time.
“Hahahahahahahaha shuhuhuhuhut uhuhuhup hahahahahahahahahahahaha!” Erin replied as she continued to laugh. That last comment of the babysitter made her feel so embarrassed! She could feel her cheeks lightning up on fire as a consequence.
“Oh, you are shutting me up? No no no, young lady. I am your babysitter, and you must treat me with respect.” Amy said, with a huge mischievous smile on her face. “In fact, since you’re just one big, adorable, ticklish little baby, you’ll get exactly what ticklish babies get!”
Quick as a lightning, Amy lowered her head until her lips made contact with the teen girl’s bare stomach, and blew a raspberry that echoed all over the house.
“GAAAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!” Erin’s laughter reached new and hysterical heights. She tried to shake and wiggle around, but it was completely useless: Amy’s grip was steel hard, and laughing so hard and loud was taking away quite a big chunk of her own energy.
“Now, are you going to act like a good baby girl and behave?” Amy asked, once again teasing the girl to no end. By that point, even Alex and Layla had broken their frozen positions to see how their older sister was faring up. They were both a bit dumbstruck to see such a scene, but strangely amused by it at the same time. They looked at each other and giggled before continuing to watch the show.
Erin, not quite aware of what she was replying to, only shook her head from side to side, as her cheeks began to turn pink from laughing so hard and the control of her body continued to slip away from her grasp.
“Oh, are you saying “no”? Am I understanding that right? Perhaps you need more tickles until you finally understand!” Amy said, and let loose the raspberries once more.
“Oh no, noooooooAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA…!” Erin exploded into completely hysterical cackles and guffaws, until by the third raspberry she was well into silent laughter territory.
Amy looked triumphantly down on her ticklee. As she smiled, she quickly began to use her free hand to tickle the hollow of one of Erin’s armpits before the poor girl could recover from her recent assault.
“HHAHAhAhahAhAHAHAHaHahA PLEEHAHEAHAHAHASE AhahhahahAHHAHA!” The girl wiggled around and kicked her legs uselessly as she begged.
“Are you going to behave like a good little girl now?” Amy asked with absolute calm.
“YEHEHEHES AHAHAHAHA YEAHAHAHAS I WHEEEEHEEHEEHEEL AHahAHHAhahahA!” Erin replied.
“Very well…” The babysitter let her words hang in the air for a second before letting the girl go. “... and you’re free!” She planted a big wet kiss on Erin’s cheek as she got up and stopped straddling the girl.

Erin needed a second to get her air back as she looked at the ceiling, wondering what the hell had just happened, and why a part of her felt such a rush from the whole ordeal instead of plain anger or rejection. She had the feeling that that curiosity would haunt her for the rest of the week, as long as Amy remained in the house with them.
She was way too enthralled in her own thoughts to notice, but if she wasn’t, Erin could have seen Layla and Alex looking at her and giggling in a giddy fashion, after the tickle onslaught she had just endured.

“Very good, my lovelies! I’m afraid you all lost this round! That does put you one step closer to the punishment… buuuuuuuuuut, as you remember, you did have one shot free. So… ready for round two?”

Erin barely nodded as she tried to play along, while Alex and Layla smiled and agreed excitedly, Layla being noticeably more into it.

“Very well… then, let’s go!”

At Amy’s words, the kids…
1421122111.title: Erin cracks!

1421122112.content:
Layla and alex looked at each other then back at amy with a grin that could make the grinch or the joker proud. Snickering to themselves the two kids snuck up and amy who was busy driving erin crazy with laughter. Just as erin was going to try to escape, amy suddenly burst out laughing. Both teens looked down to see a grinning layla and alex tickling the older teens sides and belly. Well, that's how far they could reach. With her laughter slowly overtaking her, she couldn't focus on a now grinning erin. The younger teen joined in on amy tickling her armpits and upper ribs. The babysitter fell to her knees, laughing too hard to escape. Erin sat on her hands, pinning them under her as all three of them drove her to hysterics.

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHA WAHAHAHAHAHAHIT AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA" Amy could barely speak. She could feel their fingers scribble over her with near inhuman speed. The 18-year old was laughing herself silly just as she was doing to the others. While layla and alex enjoyed themselves, erin was conflicted. She always enjoyed tickling her younger siblings but hated being tickled herself. But earlier, she felt a rush when amy tickled her. Excitement? Fear? Playfulness? She didn't know but that was a thought for later.

Amy laughed herself to tears under their assault. Erin would be a challenge to break free but she could've easily thrown the kids off if she felt like it. But the older teen was actually enjoying the sudden team up. Most of the kids she babysat knew she was ticklish but very few actually succeeded in getting her back. What the few didn't know was that she actually loved being tickled. Any of the few kids that managed to get her laughing, she could've got them off her easily but didn't. They didn't even notice that she kept herself wide open, letting them do it.

Minutes later, the three stopped grinning down at the flustered teen. But they were surprised when they saw she was smiling just as wide as them. "Not bad you three. Not a lot of kids get me laughing that hard." Amy said. Erin eyes widened as amy almost effortlessly free herself. After a quick stretch she looked at them, with a cheshire cat smile. "Now then who wants to get tickled first?" She asked, wiggling her fingers.
1421122112.title: Amy gang tickled

choices: Part cartwheels (One foot in the air)
143.content:
"Alright guys, I know what I said about the clothes, but for this game... I want everyone to wear loose workout tank tops and gym shorts." Amy said.
The three kids all hurried upstairs to hang, Alex relieved to have a shirt on finally. When they came back downstairs, there was a giant twister mat, while Amy held 2 long feathers. "Here's the deal...you all know how to play twister right?" the kids all nodded. "Alright great, last one to fall gets immunity, second one to fall gets to wear an outfit of my choosing" she said this with a devious grin "And last person, gets a surprise that I brought over for you guys."
The kids all winced, aside from Layla who jumped in excitement."Then wh-what are the feathers for?" Erin asked fearfully, almost sure that she knew the twist of the game.
"Something tells me you already know" Amy giggled and brushed a feather on her face. "Alright, time for the spinner"
After about 5 rounds, the kids find themselves in
143.title: Twister Tickles

choices: Amy gets a pie and Erin gets pied
Amy gets a dunk tanks and that all try and dunk Erin
1433.content:
Erin could believe how unlucky she was right now. She had to do a handstand over Layla’s arm. She was wobbling a lot so when Amy went over to tickle her she collapsed.
Any smiled. “I guess your out of the game.”
Erin sighed. She didn’t really mind though, except for Amy said the first one to fall gets a mysteries surprise and she had a feeling it wouldn’t be good. Oh well, she could do anything about it now.
Meanwhile, Alex was having to do a bridge pose. He knew he couldn’t hold it much longer so he was relieved when the spinner landed on blue hand, because he was able to actually adjust himself to a computer or position. When Layla’s spinner landed on yellow foot, she hit herself on Alex’s leg and fell on her stomach. “Ow,” she grunted.
Come on Layla,” Amy says, “I’ll have you put on the outfit first. Layla walks upstairs unhappily with Amy.
“Hmm... Oh how about this?”
Amy held up a green dress and put no tights. Layla groaned. She hated that dress. It was her least favorite color of green. She put it on unhappily and walked downstairs.
Alex laughed. “Hahaha you look so bad.”
Layla glared at him.
Any turned toward Erin. “Now for your mystery surprise....”
1433.title: Handstands

Before anyone had a chance to respond, Amy flashed a sassy smile and the bottle began its extremely risk-filled twirl. As the bottle slowly rattles to a halt, it is pointing directly at...

Amy smiles and continues "Here are the rules. You take turns holding your hands behind your head while I tickle your armpits. Who ever holds them up the longest wins and the loser gets tortured for 10 minutes". Erin then asks "will you be competing too"? Amy thinks about it then says "you know what, sure. 14512.content: Layla's hand shoots to the sky and declares she wants to go first. Erin and Alex sigh in relief that they don't have to suffer. Unlike their sister who enjoys this, they don't. Amy instructs layla put her hands behind her head. Amy then gets out her phone and sets a timer. "Ready layla"? asks amy as she starting wiggling her fingers. Layla, with an excited smile says "ready". Amy starts the timer and jams her hands into the young girls armpits. Layla is instantly in hysterics but doesn't put her arms down. HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA THAHAHAT REHEHEALY TIHIHIHIHICKLES layla declared through her laughter. Amy increases her tickling which increased the girls laughter. Finally after 6 minutes layla finally puts her arms down and tries to calm down although a few giggles still come out. With a happy smile layla looks at amy and says "that was fun, can we do it again"? Amy laughs and says"maybe" now who's next

HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAH STHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHP Erin was in hell to say the least. While her younger sister loved this kind of thing, she hated receiving it. She could torture layla till she cried and she'd just ask for more. @ mins later erin put her arms down and walked away from a grinning amy. "You lasted 2 minutes, not so good" Amy playfully taunted. 145122.title: Erin

info.brief_description: A babysitter famous for tickling kids has a whole week with three siblings.
info.description:
16 year old Erin is stuck at home for the week with her 11 year old brother Alex and 10 year old sister Layla. After previous incidents...her parents decided they would be better off with a babysitter. However this particular sitter, an 18 year old Amy, was known very well around the neighborhood for tickling the other kids.

Hmmm...rules

-No killing off characters
-Just tickling or lick tickling
-NO SEXUAL STUFF...Since these are kids, please don't write a bunch of sexual content.
-Lots of tickling though, so yea have fun
